DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to determine the most effective formulation of HAL for release of hexaminolevulinate to the cervical epithelium at different doses.
DOC.brief_title: Phase I Study of HAL Formulations Applied to the Cervix in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy, premenopausal female volunteers Acute or chronic disease which could influence the study results
